prompts: Create a ground-type Pokemon with a sandy texture and three smiling faces.
I want a playful Pokemon that digs underground and pops up unexpectedly.
Generate a cute Pokemon that looks like a trio of moles with cheerful expressions.
Make a Pokemon with brown tones and a rounded, burrowing body that loves to play.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in sandy environments, showcasing its digging skills.
Design a small, quirky Pokemon that resembles a group of friendly underground creatures.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the essence of teamwork with its three adorable faces.
